ygData.subject: Without any scruples
ygData.msgSnippet: The little backstreet of the poor neighbourhood was not the kind that woul draw attention. Just right. As she liked it. The kid probably wouldn t. No matter.

The little backstreet of the poor neighbourhood was not the kind that
woul =
draw attention. Just right. As she liked it. The kid probably
wouldn't. No =
matter. Feed. Fuel. Warmth. Yesss...

The kid was visibly shaken as she dra=
gged him along. Shaken and
beaten, but still functional. Just as she needed=
 him to be. And gagged
too. No need for noises.

She grabbed the small robo=
t and pinned him up on the wall. Panic. What
a feeling!

- Don't worry litt=
le one. You won't suffer... long.

She advanced her hand on the small chest=
 and, in a flash, began to rip
it open. The gag could not hold back all the=
 pained and fearful
scream, but it absorbed most of it. But there it was! A=
 small,
pulsing, delicious spark! At that moment, the gag fell.

- No, lady=
! Please! Don't do this! PLEAAAAASE!!! AAAAARRRGH!!!

She pressed her mouth=
 on the spark and it left the chest in a trickle.
The noise stopped. She wa=
s sated. The lifeless hulk fell to the floor.

She started to cry and sob, =
but she knew she had to flee before
anything else happened. She ran.
